Cosmic Formation.quote: In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth. (Genesis 1:1)

Emanation.quote: From the One flows all existence, like light from the sun. (Plotinus, Enneads V.1)

Divine Architecture.quote: The universe is built on foundations of wisdom. (Proverbs 3:19)

Primordial Pattern.quote: As above, so below. (Hermes Trismegistus, Emerald Tablet)

Creative Word.quote: Through the Word all things were made. (John 1:3)

Divine Blueprint.quote: According to the pattern shown you on the mountain. (Exodus 25:40)

Manifest Forms.quote: The visible world is but a symbol of the invisible. (Upanishads)

Sacred Structure.quote: The temple is built according to divine measure. (Ezekiel 43:10)

Divine Order.quote: Rita is the cosmic order that governs all existence. (Rig Veda)

Celestial Hierarchy.quote: From the highest to the lowest, all beings are interconnected. (Dionysus the Areopagite)

Divine Matrix.quote: In Him all things hold together. (Colossians 1:17)

Divine Proportion.quote: The harmony of the world is made manifest in Form and Number. (Kepler)

Cosmic Web.quote: Indra's net reflects the interconnected nature of all phenomena. (Avatamsaka Sutra)

Sacred Space.quote: This is none other than the house of God, and this is the gate of heaven. (Genesis 28:17)

Divine Symmetry.quote: The beauty of creation reflects the harmony of its Creator. (Augustine, City of God)

Archetypal Forms.quote: The eternal patterns from which all things are formed. (Plato, Republic)

Sacred Measure.quote: He has measured the waters in the hollow of his hand. (Isaiah 40:12)
